title: Food Website
description: This project is a responsive food website built with HTML and CSS. It features an attractive layout showcasing food items with images and descriptions. The design follows a mobile-first approach, using media queries for optimal viewing on various devices. The website provides a visually appealing interface for exploring diverse culinary offerings.

title: Weather Website
description: This project is a weather prediction application built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Node.js. It retrieves real-time weather data for various cities using a weather API. The Node.js backend processes API requests, while the frontend provides a user-friendly interface for searching cities and viewing current conditions and forecasts.

title: To Do List Website
description: This to-do list app, built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and MongoDB, lets users create, update, and delete tasks. Tasks are stored in a MongoDB database, with Node.js handling backend operations and a responsive interface for easy task management.
